data.message: If you dont want the truth then its up to you! I just want to share all things that I know! The truth!  well hell is really real! If you want to go to hell then its fine with me! Salvation is a free gift! Salvation is one by one! Church cannot saved you people! Christ only! The hope! Church or going to church cannot saved you! Repent! Make effort to be holy! No one will see the Lord if we are not Holy! 😊
